name: My Sister Becomes a Demon Sometimes...?! [Gamejam Version]
name_original: My Sister Becomes a Demon Sometimes...?! [Gamejam Version]
description:
Will is a 16yo boy who comes home to discover he will spend a weekend with his sister, who moved away due to a conflict with their parents.  During that time, he notices his sister isn't in the best mood...

- - - CREDITS - - - 

ART, CHARACTERS & UI: @shipper_desu
